resources.string: Learn a language like making new friends
Lets have a quick look at how to learn on AmazingTalker
and tell her/him what do you want her/him to help
Book a lesson at your preferred time
By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our %s.
Lets get yourself the best-fit tutor!
One more step! Allow notification to get notified when we find the best tutor for you.
The verification code has been sent to %s. Please enter the 6-digits code.
A password reset email has been sent. Please check your Email.
A password reset message has been sent. Please check your SMS.
You don\'t have any upcoming lessons.
click here for our customer service

Give a 25-mins FREE Trial Lesson from %1$s to your friends. When your friend purchases 5 lessons or more, and successfully completes the 1st lesson, you will receive a FREE 50-min lesson from %2$s as a reward. Refer a friend to receive a free lesson from %3$s with %4$s learning need today!
NO refund : Mark lesson as completed
Please explain why you are unable to attend the session. If you would like to reschedule, please suggest a more convenient time.
The session request has been sent out. Teacher has to reply the request before %s. The session will not be scheduled successfully until the teacher has confirmed it.
The session request is expired, and the system has returned back this session. Please enter Calendar page to reschedule.
The session request is expired. Please remind your student to reschedule it again. Also, please reply the session request in 24 hours next time.
The “Go to class” button will appear on the page 10 minutes prior to the class. If you would like to cancel, please do so within 12 hours prior to your lesson.
Sessions are conducted via Zoom, a video calling app. Zoom will be installed and launched automatically by clicking the “Go to class” button.

Group lesson cannot be canceled or rescheduled by students. If you cannot attend the lesson, please download the recorded video of the lesson within 24 hours after the lesson. After 24 hours, the video will be removed by the system automatically. Tutors have the final decision of the time of lessons. If you have any question, please contact your tutors directly.

If you cannot attend the lesson, please reschedule 12 hours prior to the lesson starts. System will update the calendar and notify all students. System will record a video for each group lesson. If a student cannot attend the lesson, please remind him/her to download the video within 24 hours after the lesson.
Your interview is about to start. Once you finish, the mentor has 24 hours to decide and invite you to join the team.
Your interview is about to start. You have to decide whether to invite the teacher or not within 24 hours.

If you would like to reschedule...\n12 hours in advance, please click the \"Cancel\" button below. \nwithin 12 hours, please let the teacher know you\'re not available. When the lesson starts, click the \"Write Interview Report\" button below.\"
This lesson has been cancelled by student.
This lesson has been cancelled by teacher.

Please come 5-10 minutes prior to the class to prepare. If teacher or student doesn’t show up, please try to message them to see if they are online. If they are late for 5-10 minutes, click “Report Issue”, and the teacher will determine the appropriate resolution.
Please come 5 minutes prior to the class. If you are not able to attend the lesson, please download the recorded video after the class in 24 hours.
Please come 5 minutes prior to the class. If any of your student is not able to attend the lesson, please remind him/her to download the recorded video after the class in 24 hours.
Your interview is about to start. Once you finish, the mentor has 24 hours to decide and invite you to join the team.
You have to decide whether to invite the teacher or not within 24 hours. (Go to the teacher’s profile to invite them.)

Time to go to class! Please enter the classroom in advance, and send a message first if the teacher doesn\'t show up. \nClick the \"Write Interview Report\" button below when you finish the lesson or have any problem.
The session issue has been reported. Teacher will select a proper solution shortly.
The session issue has been reported. Teacher has to select a proper solution shortly.

Teacher has replied the lesson issue. If you don’t agree with the resolution, please click here for our customer service. If you don\'t confirm the solution before %s, the system will default to solved.
Teacher has replied the lesson issue. Await student’s confirmation. If student doesn\'t confirm the solution before %s, the system will default to solved.
The lesson has been reported. Please send another request.
The lesson has been reported. Please wait for another request.
Please give feedback on your lesson. If you encountered any problems, please click “Report Issue” to notify us.
Please press \"Complete\" button after finishing the session. If you encountered any problems, please click “Report Issue” to notify us.
Please give feedback on your lesson. If you encountered any problem, please click here for our customer service.
Please \"complete\" the lesson. If you encountered any problem, please click here for our customer service.
Please go to the mentoring program and check
You have 24hrs to invite a teacher to join your team. You can invite a teacher to join your team from his/her profile page.
Please press \"Complete\" button after finishing the session. If you encountered any problems, please click here for our customer service.
Please click “complete” after the interviewer rates the lesson
If you have problems using zoom, please %s first.
Upload a screenshot or a video to our customer service so we can solve the problem for you!
Please click on the star to rate the teacher. If not, the system\'s default is five stars.
Select tags that meet your teacher\'s teaching styles (optional)
You can choose more than one answer.
Please write down a feedback for your teacher
Highly recommend using at least 1–2 lines to review the class, it will help the teacher understand your studying situation.
Show this review at Teacher\'s profile page in PRIVATE.
Write a feedback to your student
Please remind your student what to preview before the next lesson
The feedback will be sent to your student.
This will help us learn more about his/her lesson and appear on his/her profile page
This will help us learn more about his/her lesson. The teacher will not see it
This package has expired, please contact your teacher to extend the lesson(s) for you.
You can\'t reply to this conversation
\nIf this is the first time of your lesson here, you can refer this article to know how to have class.\nhttps://amazingtalker.elevio.help/en/articles/276-how-do-i-start-a-lesson
* Teachers will not get paid for uncompleted lessons once the package has expired.
No minimum purchase, valid for 24 hours
Has minimum purchase $100 USD, valid for 24 hours
Has minimum purchase $50 USD, valid for 24 hours
Expired. This record will affect your ranking on teacher\'s list.
Rejected. This record will affect your teacher’s ranking.
Are you sure you want to log out\?
Chances are you will miss the class and messages if you do not allow notification. Please go to \"Settings\" → \"Notifications\" → \"Allow Notifications\"
【Click me to contact the new student】
You’ve got a new student match, hurry up!
The student has added you to shopping cart
Please go to Lesson Detail to confirm the refund!
Around 40% off compared to 1-on-1 lessons🔥 Limited discount seats!
The more lessons you choose, the greater the discount is, check it down below or in the shopping cart!
Recommended by lots of students on AmazingTalker!
Earn more than US$%s in a month on AmazingTalker (Teacher can see only)
Lots of students purchase courses from this tutor recently.
Lots of students purchased courses from this teacher
In the past month, the tutor canceled or missed the lessons for more than 15% of the total number of lessons.
%1$s can teach %2$d languages, which language do you want to learn\?
This version of the app is outdated; please update the app
Say Hi to this teacher and recruit him/her to join your team!
Note that only %s can be entered
Do you want to overwrite the current text\?
The current text is different from the new template content. Applying this template will overwrite the current text.
You can edit it at any time in the \"Manage learning ticket reply template\" in the \"Account\" section
Must respond in the language the student expects
We have matched an active teacher to you! Please contact him/her ASAP!
You have to use %s to reply this Learning ticket
What language do you want to learn\?
What language or subject do you want to learn\?
Sorry, students have been contacted by other teachers, please try sooner next time. 😃
The student has already been contacted by other tutors.
Payment failed. Please contact us for support or use an alternative payment method.
Verify your identity with your real name in order to receive your AT coins, this also complies with anti-money laundering regulations.
The ID verification failed. Please reverify to withdraw your AT credits
Select the type of ID for verification

We need to verify your identity information to comply with anti-money laundering regulations. Please:
 ‧allow access to the phone camera
 ‧prepare to scan your passport or ID
 ‧ prepare to scan your face
The real name should match what is listed in the document. If it doesn\'t match, please re-enter it.
The real name should match what is listed in the passport. If it doesn\'t match, please re-enter it.
The ID verification information has been submitted.
Notification will be sent after your identity has been verified, at which point you can withdraw AT credits to your bank account.
You\'ve rejected access permissions for AmazingTalker on your phone, so the function will be limited. Please go to your system settings to manually enable access for AmazingTalker.
Scanning of your ID has failed, please scan your ID again.
* All times listed are in your local timezone: %s(%s)
Do you want to update your account time zone\? This will change your class notification times and how others see your time zone.
Select the time zone for your location or a nearby location.
Are you sure that you do not want to synchronize your account\'s time zone\?

When you select not to update your time zone automatically, the time on the calendar will still be automatically updated to the new time zone, but you may receive class notifications at the wrong time.
To ensure that you receive course notifications at the correct time, we strongly recommend that you automatically synchronize your device with your time zone.

Note: If you choose not to synchronize automatically, the time on the calendar will still be automatically synchronized to the new time zone to ensure that appointments you make are set to the correct course time.
Did the class not meet your expectations\? Classes that you have not attended yet can be exchanged for you to redeem classes from other teachers.
Select a tutor and write a story
Click on the teacher\'s page to learn more.
Please answer a few questions,\n so I can know a little more about your learning needs.
The recommended teacher has sent you a message!
The teacher is online now! Check your messages to discuss your needs.
A teacher has been found for you!\nThe teacher will send a private message to you soon.\nAny questions or requests can be discussed with the teacher.
No repeat order after formal lesson
No repeat order after trial lesson
Download the latest version of the app
Please update to the latest version to enjoy all the newest features!
I want to find a language tutor
I want to teach online and get students
Some of the files cannot be sent, please try again.
File size exceeded. You can only send %d MB each time.
How satisfied are you with AmazingTalker\?
Enable notifications so you won\'t miss messages or lessons. Turn on Now

string-array.name: teacher_profile_faq_book
string-array.item: After buying courses, you can book them according to the teacher’s schedule.
If “Instant Tutoring” shows on the teacher’s profile, you can book the lesson 30 minutes after the current time.
If the teacher is not online, the next available class cannot be booked until 24 hours afterward.

string-array.name: teacher_profile_faq_duration
string-array.item: The duration of a trial session is 25 minutes.
The duration of a private session is 50 minutes.
If you purchase more than 5 sessions, you will receive a discount (according to the price the teacher set).

string-array.name: teacher_profile_faq_instructions
string-array.item: Enter the website 10 minutes before the class starts. Click “My Lessons” to find your class, click “Go to class”, and then you will be in the classroom on ZOOM!
You can use ZOOM for classes both on your phone and computer. Please download ZOOM in advance if you choose to use your phone for the class.

string-array.name: teacher_profile_faq_refund
string-array.item: Please click “Report Issue” if you encountered any problems, and the teacher will determine either reschedule or refund afterward.
If the teacher doesn’t respond the issue, we will provide a full refund as AT credits for you.
